result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Bond set 2/22/22
Bond set 1/25/22
Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jorge A Lopez Rivera not in court. Court enters Judgment on Bail forfeiture. Minutes filed.
EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS ASSIGNMENT IS AUGUST 1, 2022.
Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture and Forfeiture Hearing  - Bond set 7/21/22

Attorney Chris Kuehn in court. Defendant is not present. ADA Crawford appears for the State of Wisconsin. Matter was set for Final Pre Trial on Tuesday and defendant did not appear. Matter set over to today but did not make it onto the court's calendar. Defendant is still not present in court. DA is in compliance with victim rights. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. State is requesting trial dates be removed and bond forfeiture and warrant. Court orders bond to be forfeited, warrant to be issued and trial dates are canceled. Any TRs or FO's to be defaulted.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jorge A Lopez Rivera not in court.  Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Any pending BFH to track to next court date.  Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed bond re-faxed to Jail. $5,000 already posted. $5,000 still owed.
Signed bond filed with the court.

Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jorge A Lopez Rivera appeared in court, in custody by video, Attorney Christopher Lyle Kuehn appeared in court for Jorge A Lopez Rivera.  Any pending BFH is to track next court date. Minutes filed.

Prosecuting attorney Zeke S Wiedenfeld appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jorge A Lopez Rivera appeared in court with attorney Chris Kuehn specially. Prior bond ordered forfeited. New bond set. Defendant taken into custody on cash bond. Minutes filed.
Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture and Forfeiture Hearing. Bond set 01-25-2022 ordered forfeited.

Total bond covers files: 22GF191, 22CM105, 22CM34, 22CM55, 22CM56, 22CT23, 22CT25, 22CT27, 21CT42, 21CT361, 20CT420, 20CT511, 21CM151, 21CM152 & 21CM483
Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol.  Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle at all.  Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

22-843 & 22-844
Signed bond filed with the court.

Total bond covers files: 22CM34, 22CM55, 22CM56, 22CT23, 22CT25, 22CT27, 21CT42, 21CT361, 20CT420, 20CT511, 21CM151, 21CM152 & 21CM483
Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol.  Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Not to operate a motor vehicle without an IID installed.  Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

Defendant Jorge A Lopez Rivera in court with attorney Anthony N Flitcroft for attorney Chris Kuehn.  James T. Sempf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court.  Reading of complaint waived.  Not guilty plea entered and trial reserved. Defendant was taken into custody on cash bond. Minutes filed.  Status conference scheduled for February 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
